nodes.documentation: @title Fund
nodes.name: Fund

nodes.documentation: @dev Only allows a function to be called when the contract is not stopped
nodes.name: whenNotStopped

nodes.documentation: @dev Only allows a function to be called when the contract is paused
nodes.name: whenStopped

nodes.documentation:
@dev sets the ipfs hash for contract
@param x ipfs hash
nodes.name: set

nodes.documentation: @dev returns the ipfshash associated
nodes.name: get

nodes.documentation:
@dev returns the fund associated with a users address
@param addr users address
nodes.name: getFundHashByAddress

nodes.documentation:
@dev Stores a ipfsHash of the users fund in a struct
@param ipfs string of the IPFS hash.
nodes.name: createFund

nodes.documentation:
@dev Stores a ipfsHash of the users fund in a struct
@param addr address of the fund the user wants to send funds to
nodes.name: donateToFund

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns the users funds
nodes.name: balance

nodes.documentation: @dev stops the contract
nodes.name: stop

nodes.documentation: @dev starts the contract again and returns to normal state
nodes.name: start
